subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: Dion Lewis is 5 feet 8 inches — relatively small for a running back — but has thrived in his freshman season and was named the Big East’s offensive player of the year.
snippet: Dion Lewis is 5 feet 8 inches — relatively small for a running back — but has thrived in his freshman season and was named the Big East’s offensive player of the year.
